Istanbul Night.name: Istanbul Night
Istanbul Night.description: Blueberry, red berries, black currant, with a touch of balanced sourness and smooth sweetness

Marbella.name: Marbella
Marbella.description: Cherry, caramel, chocolate, flavors reminiscent of European desserts or chocolate confections with fruits

Lime Spice Peach.name: Lime Spice Peach
Lime Spice Peach.description: Roasted peach, lime, refreshing touch, spices

Love 66.name: Love 66
Love 66.description: Passion fruit, watermelon, melon, mint, pure fruit sweetness with a light coolness

Lady Killer.name: Lady Killer
Lady Killer.description: Melon, mango, berries, light mint, balanced sweetness with light coolness

darkside.name: Darkside
darkside.description: Darkside is a premium Russian shisha tobacco brand known for its strong flavors and rich, intense smoking experience. Perfect for experienced users.

flavorsDescription.Supernova: A cool and refreshing mint flavor.
flavorsDescription.Ice crame: A sweet and creamy ice cream flavor.

starline.name: Starline
starline.description: Starline offers smooth and balanced flavors, ideal for beginners or those who enjoy light and easy smoke sessions.

flavorsDescription.Pinacolada: A tropical coconut and pineapple flavor.

musthave.name: Must Have
musthave.description: Musthave is a bold Russian brand famous for its powerful, long-lasting flavors. Designed for those who want an intense and flavorful experience.

flavorsDescription.Kiwi Smoothie: A sweet and tangy kiwi flavor.
flavorsDescription.Garnet: A sweet and sour pomegranate flavor.
flavorsDescription.PineApple Rings: A sweet and tangy pineapple flavor.

holster.name: Holster
holster.description: Holster is a modern German shisha brand that brings creative, exotic flavor mixes. Great for fans of unique and adventurous blends.

blackburn.name: Blackburn
blackburn.description: Blackburn is a bold and innovative Russian shisha brand known for its intense flavors and dark leaf tobacco. Perfect for experienced smokers seeking rich, powerful, and long-lasting sessions

Luxuria.name: Luxuria
Luxuria.description: Kiwi Smoothie 40%, Grape Mint 60%, Kiwi Juice 250 Ml
